metadata.title: CVE-2018-11408 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The security handlers in the Security component in Symfony in 2.7.x before2.7.48, 2.8.x before 2.8.41, 3.3.x before 3.3.17, 3.4.x before 3.4.11, and4.0.x before 4.0.11 have an Open redirect vulnerability whensecurity.http_utils is inlined by a container.  NOTE: this issue existsbecause of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-16652.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
